pages.title: Moonstone Pedestal
pages.text: Your latest structure feels... somewhat lacking. And now you also know exactly what is missing: more [#](d0d6d7)Moonstone[#]() exactly. The tricky part: Creating the required [#](bb00bb)Moonstone Chiseled Blocks[#]() would require you being able to use your [#](bb00bb)Moonstone Pedestal[#]() to it's full capability already.\_Could there be a way to get around that?_

pages.title: Checklist (Complete)
pages.text: - 1 Pigment Pedestal\- 4 Onyx Chiseled Blocks\- 4 Notched Polished Blocks-- 8 Gemstone Lamps\- 4 Gemstone Chiseled Blocks\- 12 Polished Gemstone Blocks\- 16 CMY Gemstone Chiseled Bl.\- 28 Moonstone Chiseled Bl.\- 36 Polished Pillars\- 52 Polished Crests\- 144 Polished Blocks
You can switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best. Mix up [#](bb00bb)Calcite[#]() and [#](bb00bb)Basalt[#]() up to create your personal variation!
